author: Gernoth

changelog.release_notes:
Comming back from the 80's directly to Your wrist (-watch). The one and (actually) only Binary watch, known as TechRAL, so the design is not my idea - but it's so great that it deserves a 2nd chance. At the moment it's only available for Pebble Time (but for all colors, steel and non-steel :-) - Pebble and Pebble Round are coming, also config is under development.
Enjoy.

description:
This watchface displays the time in binary format: Hours, Minutes, Seconds.
In addition the date, battery state and bluetooth connection status is shown.

The design is known from the 80's from the TechRAL wrist whatch: maybe the best binary watch ever.

title: TheBinWatch
